#Command Format:
#[Data Count]:[Flags,Command]:[Periph Device, Address]:[Data(ignored for reads)]

#Ping
00000000:00000000:12345678:FEDCBA98

#Reset the LCD
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000000
#Sleep
00000020

00000001:00000001:01000000:00000008
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000000

#Enable the LCD
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000003

#Sleep
00000020
#Set Chip select, set command mode
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000113
#set the command address to 0x00
00000001:00000001:01000002:00000000
#Set the write strobe
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000133
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000113
#set the command address to 0x01
00000001:00000001:01000002:00000001
#Set the write strobe
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000133
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000113
#set the chip in data mode
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000113
#Read a peice of data by strobing it in
00000001:00000001:01000000:000001D3
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000193
#Read a peice of data by strobing it in
00000001:00000001:01000000:000001D3
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000193

#Sleep
00000020

#De-assert Chip select
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000003


#Write 32 values into memory
00000020:00010001:00000000:00000000
04040400
08080800
0C0C0C00
10101000
14141400
18181800
1C1C1C00
20202000
24242400
28282800
2C2C2C00
30303000
34343400
38383800
3C3C3C00
40404000
44444400
48484800
4C4C4C00
50505000
54545400
58585800
5C5C5C00
60606000
64646400
68686800
6C6C6C00
70707000
74747400
78787800
7C7C7C00



#Sleep
00000080


#Write 0x000 into Address 0x04 (Mem 0 Base)
00000001:00000001:01000004:00000000

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x05 (Mem 0 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000005:00000020

#Sleep
00000200



#Ping
00000000:00000000:12345678:FEDCBA98
